title: Microsoft 365 Agentic User Template Schema
description: Schema for Microsoft 365 Agentic User Template configuration - Development Preview version 0.1.0

$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for this manifest

id.description: Unique identifier for the agentic user template. Must contain only alphanumeric characters, dots, underscores, and hyphens.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the agentic user template schema.

agentIdentityBlueprintId.description: Agent Identity Blueprint ID registered in Azure AD portal. Must be a valid GUID.

communicationProtocol.description: Protocol used for communicating with the agentic user.
